meanings.definition: A waxy substance found in cork cells.
meanings.sent1: The suberins in cork cells help protect the plant.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the properties of suberins in cork.
meanings.sent3: The suberins in cork cells decided to throw a party.
meanings.sent4: The suberins formed a strong barrier like a fortress around the plant.
meanings.sent5: The shiny suberins in cork cells glistened in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: The main component of suberin, a complex polymer.
meanings.sent1: Suberins play a crucial role in the structure of suberin.
meanings.sent2: The lab analyzed the composition of suberins in the polymer.
meanings.sent3: The suberins in the polymer had a dance-off.
meanings.sent4: The suberins held the polymer together like glue.
meanings.sent5: The intricate network of suberins formed a strong bond in the polymer.
